attributes.action: put a ban on broadcasting of hatred of anyform via new equipment
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
in todays world there are many forms of new broadcasting equipment which can be used for a hidden agenda of inciting murder, stalking, hatred, harassment and also making up rubbish about people.

in parliament i would like that would set an authority such as radio authority the power to vet all new forms of broadcasting equipment and the purchasers of such equipement
